Package io.reinert.requestor.oauth2

Base package for managing user authentication using OAuth2 (draft 10).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Auth
    Provides methods to manage authentication flow.
    AuthRequest
    Represents a request for authentication to an OAuth 2.0 provider server.
    TokenInfo
    Encapsulates information of an access token, its token type and when it will expire.

Package io.reinert.requestor.oauth2 Description

Base package for managing user authentication using OAuth2 (draft 10).

The main class to use in this package is Auth. To begin the authentication process, call Auth.login(AuthRequest, com.google.gwt.core.client.Callback).

See Auth.login(AuthRequest, com.google.gwt.core.client.Callback).
